name: tp
about: Templo is a template manager that provide you more flexibility and agility at software development time.

submethods.name: save
submethods.about: Get template from real files and folders and saves it in a repository

submethods.name: gen
submethods.about: Generates a template in a specific folder

submethods.name: get
submethods.about: Gets a template from web server using http

submethods.name: view
submethods.about: Views template data and metadata informations

submethods.name: repo
submethods.about: Shows all templates that exists in a repo

submethods.name: mv
submethods.about: Moves a template from a repo to another repo
